value:
What a lovely beach... I wish my
brother and sister could be here
with me. And Lonato, too.

I never imagined I'd be able to afford
a beach trip like this, but here I am,
having fun with everyone!

Do you think ghosts come out at the
beach at night? O-on second thought,
maybe we shouldn't talk about that...

I was helping out at a food stall that
was set up on the beach! I figured
they could use my cooking skills.

Even if you're wearing a swimsuit,
you can't slack on training. I won't
become a great knight if I take breaks!

My name is Ashe. I've come to
deliver summer greetings from
$Nf's castle!

My body feels lighter than usual!
Do you think it's because this
swimsuit is easy to move in?

I need to work harder. I'm not
gonna lose to the summer sun!

Have I been having too much fun?
I need to pull myself together!

I think I'm almost done...maybe?
I'll keep working hard!

I'm Ashe Ubert. I'm studying to
become a knight. And today's training
is... Huh? Swimming in the sea?!

When I was little, I read a chivalric
tale about a knight who crossed the
sea to save many countries.$k$pThinking about what adventures lie
in wait across the sea made me want
to become a knight one day too.$k$pI wonder what kind of country lies
beyond the sea of Askr,
$Nu.$k$pThough I hope for peace, if there are
people in trouble across the sea, I
want to go fight for them.$k$pBut first, we should help the people
right where we are, right? We need to
bring peace to the Kingdom of Askr.$k$pFor now, it's just a dream... But one
day, I want to save people across the
sea, just like the knight in that story!
たあっ
ていっ
わあっ
We're sinking...
Calm as the waves!
I will become a knight!
I'm reeling you in!
Sink or swim!
Going...under...
ははっ
I was so excited to hit the beach today that I hardly slept at all last night!
Some kind of...frozen sweet? Don't mind if I do!
I once got lost in a book about tropical travel. Now I feel like I'm living it!
I like seeing my friends cut loose at the beach. As long as they don't go overboard...
Look at how many fish I caught. Quite the haul, if I do say so myself!
I wish I could share this sunrise with my brother and sister...
I'll never forget the time we spent together this summer. It was wonderful. Thank you.
Let's beat the heat!
Time for a break?
I'll give summer my all!
